info.name: Travel Booking API - Complete Collection Copy
info.description: Complete Travel Booking API - Auth, Flights, Bookings, Payments, Reference Data & Analytics

request.description: Create a new user account. Returns userId and OTPs sent for email/phone verification.

request.description: Login with email and password. Returns JWT token and user details.

Resend OTP to email for verification.
Resend OTP to phone for verification.
Get current user profile (requires authentication).

request.description: Create a new flight booking. Can be used with or without authentication (guest booking).
Create booking and initiate payment in one step. Returns booking details and payment URL.
Get booking details by booking ID.
Get booking by reference number (requires email verification for guest bookings).
Get all bookings for the logged-in user (requires authentication).
Cancel a booking. Refund will be processed if applicable.
Create/initiate a new payment for a booking. Returns payment URL for redirect.

response.name: Create Payment
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "statusCode": 201,
    "message": "Payment initiated successfully",

request.description: Handle payment callback/verification from payment gateway.
Get payment details by payment reference.
Check payment status by payment reference.
Process refund for a payment.
Get all payments for a specific booking.
Razorpay webhook endpoint (called by Razorpay).
Stripe webhook endpoint (called by Stripe).
